service_description.short_description: This LLM-based service recognizes the bias of news articles and presents a bias score from 0 (extremely biased) to 1 (not biased) for each submitted article.
service_description.description:
Welcome to the TrustLevel News Bias Detector.

News articles often suffer from bias and manipulation, making it hard to find objective reporting. This service is designed to detect bias in news articles and ensure that you can rely on more credible information. 

Each submitted news article is analyzed and given a bias score from 0 (extremely biased) to 1 (non-biased). In addition, a brief explanation of how the score is determined is shown.

The following reference values can be used to interpret the output values:

- 0.0 - 0.4 = extremely biased
- 0.4 - 0.6 = highly biased
- 0.7 - 0.8 = moderately biased
- 0.9 - 1.0 = not biased

For a detailed description and documentation of the service, please visit the following website: https://docs.trustlevel.io/ai-services/news-bias-detector
